MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL15 postcode area of Ruthin, affecting properties in the local area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown to make emergency repairs to equipment on the overhead lines network. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complications on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:12PM on 5th April 2021.
